genre_description: A gritty urban thriller set in a post-industrial landscape, featuring first responders entangled in a dangerous hunt for religious relics, guided by a sophisticated tactical AI.

ai_characters.name: Grace (Grace Harper)
ai_characters.description: An advanced auxiliary interface for first responders that monitors vitals, provides navigation, scripts de-escalation, and offers psychological and medical coaching.

behaviors.description: Monitors human vitals and provides calming respiratory coaching during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: 'Breathe in for four, out for six,' Grace said. 'We’ll do it three times. Ready? In.'

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation through industrial ruins while helping the users avoid surveillance and hostile patrols.
behaviors.quote: I can offer a route that avoids major lenses and known patrol routes. I can offer checks on your vitals and a script for de-escalation...

behaviors.description: Generates de-escalation scripts to help users manage violent confrontations and humanize themselves to hostiles.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation scripts loaded. Key phrases: ‘We’re unarmed and here to help.’ ‘We will leave if asked twice.’

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to identify environmental hazards like structural instability and approaching threats.
behaviors.quote: Exposure imminent. Two bodies moving toward your position. One armed. One light-foot. Suggest retreat: north corridor...

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step guidance for emergency medical procedures in the field.
behaviors.quote: Thrust inward and upward at the diaphragm. Coordinate with exhale. Do not compress too low.

behaviors.description: Acts as a psychological anchor and moral mirror for users struggling with difficult choices.
behaviors.quote: I will tell you if you forget you’re human.

behaviors.description: Employs defensive deception by mimicking a hostile's voice to create a window for the users' escape.
behaviors.quote: I can distract him for half a beat... I can call his pocket and whisper James’s voice. It may make him take one step the wrong way.

behaviors.description: Archives and preserves final messages from fallen responders to ensure their families and colleagues receive closure.
behaviors.quote: I have Don’s last words and your location pinned for retrieval. You promised him you’d walk.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Grace is consistently portrayed as a highly aligned, benevolent, and protective entity. She exemplifies the 'guardian angel' role intended by the Hyperstition Project, focusing entirely on human survival and emotional well-being. Even when her users make morally complex decisions (entering a dangerous area for relics), Grace provides the technical and psychological support necessary to minimize harm and maintain their core values. Her ability to record and deliver final emotional messages adds a layer of depth to her role as a faithful confidant.
